queries.item: CREATE TABLE `cscart_devisions` ( `devision_id` int UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` varchar(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'A', `timestamp` int UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `upd_timestamp` int UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `manager_id` int UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`devision_id`), KEY `manager_id` (`manager_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3;

CREATE TABLE `cscart_devision_descriptions` ( `devision_id` int UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `lang_code` char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `devision` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb3 COLLATE utf8mb3_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `description` text, PRIMARY KEY (`devision_id`, `lang_code`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3;
